com.prolificinteractive.materialcalendarview.format

Interface DayFormatter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DateFormatDayFormatter

    public interface DayFormatter
    Supply labels for a given day. Default implementation is to format using a SimpleDateFormat

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static DayFormatter DEFAULT
      Default implementation used by MaterialCalendarView

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String format(CalendarDay day)
      Format a given day into a string
